description: The Sakharov prize was given to 10 opposition figures, including exiled Svetlana Tikhanovskaya.
title: Sakharov prize: Belarus opposition leader 'humbled' by award
title_page: Sakharov prize: Belarus opposition leader 'humbled' by award - BBC News
maintext: "They have stood and still stay strong in the face of a much stronger adversary. But they have on their side something that brute force can never defeat - and this is the truth," the parliament's president, David Sassoli, said while announcing the winners in October.
